dataTemplate.name: NVO_CUSTOMS_SHIP_AES_AUDIT
dataTemplate.description: NVO Customs Shipment for AES Audit

dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(:START_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD'),'MM/DD/YYYY') start_dt, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(:END_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD'),'MM/DD/YYYY') end_dt, :PERCENT percentage FROM DUAL

SELECT sref.shipment_refnum_value job_id, (SELECT oref.order_release_refnum_value FROM shipment_s_equipment_join ssej INNER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessuj ON ssej.s_equipment_gid = sessuj.s_equipment_gid INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul ON sessuj.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN order_release_refnum oref ON ssul.order_release_gid = oref.order_release_gid AND oref.order_release_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.LOC_CODE' WHERE ssej.shipment_gid = ship.shipment_gid AND ROWNUM = 1) loc, gtr.gtm_transaction_xid customs_ship_no, TO_CHAR(gtr.insert_date,'MM/DD/YYYY') shipment_create_date, (SELECT gtip.involved_party_contact_gid FROM gtm_transaction_involved_party gtip WHERE gtip.gtm_transaction_gid = gtr.gtm_transaction_gid AND gtip.involved_party_qual_gid = 'USPPI' AND ROWNUM = 1) usppi_code, (SELECT gtip.involved_party_contact_gid FROM gtm_transaction_involved_party gtip WHERE gtip.gtm_transaction_gid = gtr.gtm_transaction_gid AND gtip.involved_party_qual_gid = 'SHIP_FROM' AND ROWNUM = 1) ship_from_code, loc.location_name shipper_name, glog_util.remove_domain(sip2.involved_party_contact_gid) ops_manager FROM (SELECT DISTINCT doc.owner_object_gid FROM document doc WHERE doc.domain_name = 'SCOULAR/NVO' AND doc.document_def_gid = 'AES_FILING' AND doc.report_gid = 'AES_FILING' AND (from_tz(CAST(doc.generated_at AS TIMESTAMP), 'GMT') AT TIME ZONE 'US/Central' >= TO_DATE(:START_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AND from_tz(CAST(doc.generated_at AS TIMESTAMP), 'GMT') AT TIME ZONE 'US/Central' <= TO_DATE(:END_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD')) ORDER BY sys.dbms_random.value) a INNER JOIN gtm_transaction gtr ON a.owner_object_gid = gtr.gtm_transaction_gid INNER JOIN gtm_trans_refnum gtref ON gtr.gtm_transaction_gid = gtref.gtm_transaction_gid AND gtref.gtm_trans_refnum_qual_gid = 'SHIPMENT REFERENCE NUMBER' INNER JOIN shipment ship ON 'SCOULAR/NVO.' || gtref.refnum_value = ship.shipment_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum sref ON ship.shipment_gid = sref.shipment_gid AND sref.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.JOB_ID' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_involved_party sip1 ON ship.shipment_gid = sip1.shipment_gid AND sip1.involved_party_qual_gid = 'SHIPPER' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_involved_party sip2 ON ship.shipment_gid = sip2.shipment_gid AND sip2.involved_party_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.OPS MANAGER' LEFT OUTER JOIN location loc ON sip1.involved_party_contact_gid = loc.location_gid WHERE ROWNUM < ( SELECT DISTINCT COUNT(doc.owner_object_gid) FROM document doc WHERE doc.domain_name = 'SCOULAR/NVO' AND doc.document_def_gid = 'AES_FILING' AND doc.report_gid = 'AES_FILING' AND (from_tz(CAST(doc.generated_at AS TIMESTAMP), 'GMT') AT TIME ZONE 'US/Central' >= TO_DATE(:START_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AND from_tz(CAST(doc.generated_at AS TIMESTAMP), 'GMT') AT TIME ZONE 'US/Central' <= TO_DATE(:END_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD'))) * (:PERCENT / 100)
